casebody.data:
SANDS AVIATION, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company; and Interface Operations Bermuda Ltd., a Foreign Limited Company, Appellants,
v.
AIS-INTERNATIONAL, LTD., a Foreign Limited Company, Respondent. Sands Aviation, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company; and Interface Operations Bermuda Ltd., a Foreign Limited Company, Appellants,
v.
AIS-International, Ltd., a Foreign Limited Company, Respondent. No. 73522
No. 74114 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MARCH 28, 2019

AFFIRMED IN PART. REVERSED IN PART.
